text: Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwawan'gumbile wanganyammwe kuumila mwa mundu jumpepe (Adam), nijwaawisile kuumila mwa jwalakwejo wankwakwe (Hawa), kuti jutulalileje (jwannume jwalijose) kwa wele (wankwakweo). Sano ndema jaakwaakumbatilaga, akasajigalaga (wammasyetowo) nsigo wakwepepala, ni akasajendagajendaga nao, nambo pati upesile (nsigowo nikusigala panandi kuweleka) wanawawili (walume ni wankwao) akasam’bombaga Allah M'mbuje gwao (kuti): “Naga nkutupa mwanache jwambone (jwalungalunga) chisimu chituwe mu wakutogolela.”
